column6: This Wednesday, WEDNESDAY, Wendnesday!!  Witness the fight to end all fights!!!  (Well, until next issue.)  Aaron Stack (just don't call him Machine Man) takes on Fin Fang Foom in a knock-down drag-out slug-fest!  While his robotic body digests in Fin's belly, the rest of the NEXTWAVE squad has to defeat the deadly Human Resource Department of their former bosses, the Highest Anti-Terroism Effort (H.A.T.E.)!  PLUS: Things explode!!  Pick up the comic that had Albert Einstein saying, "I haven't had this much fun since my college days at Eidgenössische Technische Hochschule!"
column8: | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | writer:Warren Ellis | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | penciller (cover):Stuart Immonen | colorist:Dave McCaig
